thread.title: A ‘Doonesbury’ in bad taste
thread.title_full: A ‘Doonesbury’ in bad taste - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: A ‘Doonesbury’ in bad taste
text:
October 9 at 7:45 PM I thought the Oct. 4 “ Doonesbury ” strip, which featured Quote: s from Donald Trump on women, immigrants and the candidate himself and appeared on the front page of the Sunday Comics section, leapt the bounds of harsh political satire to incredibly bad taste.
The content was especially inappropriate in a section of The Post read by small children.
For the same reason that many parents are not allowing their young children to watch the Republican debates, perhaps they must now deny access to or censor The Post’s Comics section.
Please consider not publishing individual strips like this one or simply moving “Doonesbury” to another location in the newspaper.
Alvin Bales , Herndon
